1.0.name: wordpress/simple-image-manipulator
1.0.description:
Simple Image Manipulator is an simplest way that any one can manipulate images on wordpress. No need to use photoshop for adding effets or resizing images anymore because thats what this plugin does. This is the first version of the plugin. New versions will have more features, till than enjoy SIM Version 1.0.

SIM Features

  • Resize images using Slider, yes thats right ;)
  • Add Grayscale
  • Add Sepia
  • Add Border
  • Add Border Color and size
  • Add Reflection
  • Auto upload to Media Library on save
  • Download Image to local machine

Limitations: Supported image types: gif,jpeg,png. Max image width 2000px;
